query:
SELECT
                    c.id as "id: CategoryId",
                    c.raw_title,
                    co.color,
                    co.is_enabled as "is_enabled: Option<bool>",
                    (
                        SELECT
                            json_agg(json_build_object(
                                'id', s.id,
                                'title', s.title,
                                'color', s.color
                            ))
                        FROM
                            subcategories s
                        WHERE
                            s.category_id = c.id AND
                            s.user_id = $1
                    ) as "subcategories: Json<Vec<SubcategoryResult>>"
                FROM
                    categories c
                LEFT JOIN
                    categories_override co ON
                        co.category_id = c.id AND
                        co.user_id = $1
                WHERE
                    c.id = $2
